name: Advanced WP Hide Referer
author: abdelilah elghazal

sections.description:
Hide Referer for WordPress removes the referer (referrer) from all external links on your blog. It does this by converting all outgoing
links on your blog using the href.li service and effectively hides your site as origin of the referred link.

For example, Hide Referer for WordPress will convert an external link to wordpress.org, to https://href.li/?http://wordpress.org.
sections.installation:
1. Install Advanced WP Hide Referer either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. All your external links are un-refered
sections.faq:
Is this free?

Yes, this plugin and the href.li service are free to use.
